item.title: 新消息：据知情人士透露，Reddit 备受关注的首次公开募股路演将于周一开始，它计划在 3 月 20 日进行首次公开募股定价，并于次日开始交易，这次科技上市将为 2024 年的市场奠定基调故事/@NicholasMegaw
item.description:
NEW: The roadshow for Reddit’s closely watched public debut will start on Monday, per sources

It plans to price the IPO on March 20 & start trading the following day in a tech listing that will set the tone for the market in 2024
Story w/ @NicholasMegaw https://t.co/DYIqvQSKhL

— Hannah Murphy (@MsHannahMurphy) March 7, 2024

item.title: 这标志着自《金融时报》去年报道该指控以来，民事法庭首次讨论这位金融家涉嫌的不当性行为。
item.description:
